story.caption-01: ﻿All rights reserved, No publication permitted. Shimano Inc. Speciﬁcations are subject to change without notice. © October 2015 Shimano Inc., TRIM﻿

ptxt-02.ctxt04: ﻿A new way of leveraging everything shimano knows about the total cycling experience. Our starting point for shimano fusion is the heart of the ride experience... The rider. We surround them with advanced technologies and innovative design to create on-the-body products that function so seamlessly... So perfectly, that they maximize performance. Ultimately building confidence—no matter the conditions or weather elevating the ride experience to new levels. Beginning with specific rider profiles, shimano fusion concept tailors apparel, footwear, eyewear and bags that perform perfectly for the intended use. When gear comes together to work this well, all that is left is the pure joy of the ride.﻿

ptxt-01.ctxt04: ﻿Advanced moisture-managing fibers keep your feet dry and enhance comfort.﻿
﻿The Cushioning on top of the foot is engineered to reduce pressure and stress to the dorsal surface of the foot.﻿
﻿Thick fabric surrounds the toes for superior heat retention and comfort.﻿
﻿Anatomically designed U+FEFF construction with distinct shapes to match the contours of the left and right feet.﻿
﻿This section of the sock helps to keep the arch of the foot raised to prevent fatigue.﻿

story.spec-02: ﻿Advanced fabric converts moisture to heat, keeping your toes dry and warm when the temperature creeps down.﻿

spec-04.ctxt01: ﻿Breath hyper® yarn for toes and heels﻿
﻿Thick pile fabric on toes for superior heat retention﻿
﻿Thick fabric on instep for soft fit﻿

story.spec-02: ﻿These soft and warm winter socks keep you comfortable when the mercury drops.﻿

spec-04.ctxt01: ﻿Thick pile fabric on toes for superior heat retention﻿
﻿Thick fabric on instep for soft fit﻿
